backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister providing access control initialization and queries plus extensive type definitions for user profiles, measurements, exercises, motivation, and calorie tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the frontend app and defining favicon assets.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-50-to-live.md: Runbook detailing steps to promote Draft Version 50 of the frontend to live production across multiple deployment methods.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app controlling authentication flow, profile setup gating, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/BurnedCalorieTra: Component for adding, editing, and displaying burned calorie entries with validation and optional compact mode.
frontend/src/components/CalorieTracker.t: Component for logging, editing, and charting calorie intake entries with error handling and a compact display option.
Weekly exercise planner allowing users to add, delete, and manage exercises by day and category for the current week.
Displays and manages daily exercise checklists, including completion toggles, streak calculation, and exercise removal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing user greeting, profile edit button, and logout control.
frontend/src/components/MeasurementsTrac: Tracks body measurements with add and edit functionality, validating inputs and displaying progress.
frontend/src/components/MotivationCard.t: Shows the daily motivational quote fetched from the backend with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditDialo: Modal for viewing and updating user profile details and preferences with validation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressPhotoGal: Placeholder card indicating upcoming progress photo upload and gallery functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays user progress metrics including weight, calories, exercise completion, and charts using data from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/WeightTracker.ts: Manages weight entry, editing, and visualization with charts and backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data through the backend actor with error parsing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabbed sections for overview, tracking, exercise, photos, and progress, pulling user profile data and handling logout.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, feature highlights, and a signâ€‘in button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form allowing users to enter name, email, and preferences, then saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, favicon requirements, known issues, and feature requests for favicon generation and deployment.
